thread.title: Tomas Berdych, Caroline Wozniacki crash in Beijing smog
thread.title_full: China Open: Tomas Berdych, Caroline Wozniacki crash in Beijing smog - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Tomas Berdych, Caroline Wozniacki crash in Beijing smog
text: *Beijing:* Tomas Berdych and Caroline Wozniacki both lost their way in Beijing's choking smog as they exited the haze-hit China Open with tough defeats on Wednesday. As air pollution hovered at "hazardous" levels and fans in face masks became commonplace, Berdych was sent packing just 24 hours after arriving from his victory in ... Â»
